verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Now I belong to Jesus,
Jesus belongs to me.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Not for the years
of time alone,
But for eternity.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Jesus my Lord
will love me forever,
From Him no pow’r
of evil can sever,

verse.name: v1b
v2a
verse.lines:
Once I was lost
in sin’s degradation,
Jesus came down to bring
me salvation,

verse.name: v2b
v3a
verse.lines:
Joy floods my soul
for Jesus has saved me,
Freed me from sin
that long had enslaved me,

verse.name: v3b
